1.14.name: wordpress/google-adsense-plug-and-play
1.14.description:
Google Adsense Plug and Play is designed to be simple, just install and set your adsense publisher ID in the settings page. You will immediately have ads available on your posts and pages.

There is also a widget for the sidebar which you can use, just drag and drop it in your sidebar widget area.

In the settings page you can specify what kind of ad you wish to show on top and on the bottom of your posts and pages (banners, big rectancle, etc...). You can also change the backgroundcolors and bordercolors of the ad to match your websites background and colors. It is perfect for simply showing ads on posts and pages, and easy to setup. You can also choose to only show ads on posts or only on pages. So for being very easy and simple there are also a few configurable parameters.

To install the plugin the best way is to search this plugin through the wordpress plugin page (search for 'google adsense plug and play') and install it.

After the installation you
